scenes.background: Monica and Bob are now preparing to implement the solutions you suggested during the video call.
scenes.description: 'Thanks for your help. But what if we encounter more issues? Will you be available?'

options.text: I'll be available for a short while, but then I really need to disconnect.
options.analysis: You are showing empathy and willingness to help, but still maintaining some personal boundaries and self-regulation.

options.text: I hope you can manage from here. Please try to solve it independently.
options.analysis: You are setting clear boundaries for your time off, showing strong self-regulation, but your empathy and motivation could be perceived as lower.

options.text: I might not be available later. You'll need to rely on your own skills.
options.analysis: You are emphasizing the need for personal time, showing strong self-regulation but lower perception, empathy, and motivation to help.
